message.content:
cs.CV, cs.NA, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.GR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision) - The paper discusses the application of the proposed approach to the vectorial Mumford-Shah functional, which is a well-known problem in computer vision. 
2. cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) - The paper proposes a systematic approach to the discretization of continuous convex relaxations, which is a topic of interest in numerical analysis. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper discusses the relationship to existing discretizations and to discrete-continuous MRFs, which are topics of interest in machine learning. 
4. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper proposes a new approach to solving nonconvex free-discontinuity problems, which involves developing new algorithms and data structures. 
5. cs.GR (Graphics) - The paper discusses the application of the proposed approach to computer graphics problems, such as image segmentation.
